metadata.title: CVE-2022-23517 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rails-html-sanitizer is responsible for sanitizing HTML fragments in Railsapplications. Certain configurations of rails-html-sanitizer < 1.4.4 use aninefficient regular expression that is susceptible to excessivebacktracking when attempting to sanitize certain SVG attributes. This maylead to a denial of service through CPU resource consumption. This issuehas been patched in version 1.4.4.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-html-sanitizer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
